short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance the Sketchful.io experience with Moderator Tools

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sketchful.io Moderation Tool - Elevate Your Streaming Experience!

Welcome to the Sketchful.io Moderation Tool, the ultimate companion for content creators and live streamers on Sketchful.io. This feature-packed extension is designed to enhance your streaming process, providing valuable tools to maintain a safe and enjoyable environment for your audience.

Features:

Drawing Visibility Control: Block pictures and text from individual players during the gallery reveal, giving you unparalleled control over the content displayed on your stream.

Easy Preview: Hover over blocked content to preview it in a designated off-stream preview area during the gallery reveal, ensuring you stay ahead of the game.

Custom Censor Images: Set custom censor images directly from the Sketchful.io home page, adding a personal touch to your moderation efforts.

Elevate your Sketchful.io streaming experience with the Sketchful.io Moderation Tool. Stream smarter, stream safer! Install now and level up your Sketchful.io content creation journey.

Note: The Sketchful.io Moderation Tool is not affiliated with or endorsed by Sketchful.io or Twitch.
